|brand = Seagate |model = Business Storage |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 4-Bay NAS |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS3420; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = ARM11MPCore |cpu1spd = 700<!-- 300 / 500 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F2G08U0C-SCB0; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SLC NAND |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L4006EM2I-12G; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG8JB-25; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:10:75
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2008.10-mpcore;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.35.13;;
|exp_if_types = SATA II, USB 3.0 (Type A) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 5 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 4.47 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, LACP, WoL, heatsink, fan, power switch |addchip = eMMC Controller;Phison;PS8007-A;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Controller;ASMedia;ASM1042;;1;,,, 50V 3A PNP Transistor;NXP;PBSS5350Z;;1;,,, 512K SPI Serial Memory;Atmel;AT25F512;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;TI;SN74LVC32A;;1;,,, 5A 32V 500kHZ Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8289;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9045;;1;,,, Dual D-type Positive-Edge-Triggered Flip-Flop;TI;SN74AHC74;;1;,,, PCI Express Gen 2 & Gen 3 Generator;Silicon Labs;SL28PCIe26;;1;,,, 3A 12V Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;ANPEC;APW7145;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;3;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;2;,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ LP LDO RTC;Maxim;MAX17020;;1;,,, PCI Express to Serial ATA Gen II Host Controller;Silicon Image;SiI3531;;1;,,, 2 Port SATA Port Multiplier Storage Processor;Silicon Image;SiI3723;;2;,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;On Semiconductor;ADT7473;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4818B;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2/2013 |estprice = 430 |upc = 763649033401 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822178327 |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ELCAPITAN", "11046-1" and "48.64T01.011" are silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Cavium]] CNS3420 @700MHz :Dual-core (ARM11MP Core) *Memory: 512MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Storage: 512KB (SPI NOR) Flash, :256MB (SLC NAND) Flash, 5x SATA II *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 Type A ports *Power: 19V 4.47A via barrel
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnet.com/reviews/seagate-business-storage-4-bay-nas-review/ ''Seagate Business Storage 4-Bay NAS'' review on '''CNet'''] *[https://www.alphr.com/networking/32449/seagate-business-storage-4-bay-nas-review/ ''Seagate Business Storage 4-Bay NAS'' review on '''Alphr''']
